price: Haimlazimu Mtume ila kufikisha ujumbe tu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anajua mnacho kidhihirisha na mnacho kificha.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ
footnotes: Haimlazimikii Mtume ila kuwafikishia watu anayo funuliwa yeye, ili isimame hoja juu yao na wasiwe na kisingizio chochote cha kuwa ati hawakuonywa wala hawakufunzwa. Basi yajueni anayo kuleteeni Mtume, kwani Mwenyezi Mungu anayajua mnayo dhihirisha na mnayo yaficha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
